summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of Wolmer's Boys' School Transcript Tracker system. All 3 portals (Student, Admin, Staff) are fully functional with JWT authentication, role-based access, analytics dashboard with charts, user management, and transcript request workflows.
passed_tests: Landing page loads with maroon/gold theme and Wolmer's branding
Admin login with default credentials (admin@wolmers.org / Admin123!)
Admin dashboard displays analytics charts (pie charts, bar charts)
Admin can create new staff users through user management
Student can submit complete transcript request forms
JWT authentication and role-based access control
Analytics endpoint returns proper chart data
Request status workflow (Pending → In Progress → Processing → Ready → Completed)
All navigation and routing between portals
